thread.title: Mets slugger Cespedes hit in left hand by pitch, leaves game
thread.title_full: Mets slugger Cespedes hit in left hand by pitch, leaves game

title: Mets slugger Cespedes hit in left hand by pitch, leaves game
text:
> Pennsylvania Mets slugger Cespedes hit in left hand by pitch, leaves game New York Mets' Yoenis Cespedes, left, reacts after being hit by a pitch from Philadelphia Phillies' Justin De Fratus as catcher Cameron Rupp looks on during the third inning of a baseball game, Wednesday, Sept. 30, 2015, in Philadelphia.
